verses.verse: The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6>perishes,<s%> and no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7760>lays<s%> it to <S%H3820>heart;<s%> and <S%H2617>merciful<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> are taken <S%H622>away,<s%> none <S%H995>considering<s%> that the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is taken <S%H622>away<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
He <S%H935>enters<s%> into <S%H7965>peace;<s%> they <S%H5117>rest<s%> in their <S%H4904>beds,<s%> each one who <S%H1980>walks<s%> in his <S%H5228>uprightness.<s%>
"But draw <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H1121>here,<s%> you sons of the <S%H6049>sorceress,<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H5003>adulterer<s%> and the <S%H2181>prostitute.<s%>

Against whom do you <S%H6026>sport<s%> <S%H7337>yourselves?<s%> Against whom do you make a wide <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and stick <S%H748>out<s%> your <S%H3956>tongue?<s%> <S%H3206>Aren't<s%> you children of <S%H6588>disobedience,<s%> a <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood,<s%>

you who <S%H2552>inflame<s%> yourselves among the <S%H410>oaks,<s%> under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree;<s%> who <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H3206>children<s%> in the <S%H5158>valleys,<s%> under the <S%H5585>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5553>rocks?<s%>

Among the <S%H2511>smooth<s%> stones of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> is your <S%H2506>portion;<s%> <S%H1486>they,<s%> they are your lot; you have even <S%H8210>poured<s%> a drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> to <S%H5927>them.<s%> You have offered an <S%H4503>offering.<s%> Shall I be appeased for these <S%H5162>things?<s%>
On a <S%H5375>high<s%> and <S%H1364>lofty<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> you have <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H4904>bed;<s%> there also you went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2076>offer<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice.<s%>

<S%H310>Behind<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> and the <S%H4201>posts<s%> you have set <S%H7760>up<s%> your <S%H2146>memorial:<s%> for you have <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> to someone besides <S%H5927>me,<s%> and have gone up; you have <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> your <S%H4904>bed,<s%> and <S%H3772>made<s%> you a covenant with <S%H157>them:<s%> you loved their <S%H4904>bed<s%> <S%H3027>where<s%> you saw <S%H2372>it.<s%>

You <S%H7788>went<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H7235>increased<s%> your <S%H7547>perfumes,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> your <S%H6735>ambassadors<s%> far <S%H7350>off,<s%> and <S%H8213>debased<s%> yourself even to <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>

You were <S%H3021>wearied<s%> with the <S%H7230>length<s%> of your <S%H1870>way;<s%> yet you <S%H559>didn't<s%> say, <S%H2976><s%> 'It is in vain.' You <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H2416>reviving<s%> of your <S%H3027>strength;<s%> therefore you <S%H2470>weren't<s%> faint.

"Of whom have you been <S%H1672>afraid<s%> and in <S%H3372>fear,<s%> that you <S%H3576>lie,<s%> and have not <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H7760>me,<s%> nor laid it to your <S%H3820>heart?<s%> <S%H2814>Haven't<s%> I held my peace even of long <S%H5769>time,<s%> and you <S%H3372>don't<s%> fear me?
I will <S%H5046>declare<s%> your <S%H6666>righteousness;<s%> and as for your <S%H4639>works,<s%> they shall not profit <S%H3276>you.<s%>

When you <S%H2199>cry,<s%> let those who you have gathered <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H7307>you;<s%> but the wind shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1892>them,<s%> a breath shall carry them all <S%H5375>away:<s%> but he who <S%H3947>takes<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in me shall <S%H5157>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>"

He will <S%H559>say,<s%> "Cast <S%H5549>up,<s%> cast <S%H5549>up,<s%> <S%H6437>prepare<s%> the <S%H1870>way,<s%> take <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H4383>stumbling-block<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H7311>high<s%> and lofty <S%H5375>One<s%> who <S%H7931>inhabits<s%> <S%H5703>eternity,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H6918>Holy:<s%> "I <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4791>high<s%> and <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H1793>place,<s%> with him also who is of a contrite and <S%H8217>humble<s%> <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> to <S%H2421>revive<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H8217>humble,<s%> and to <S%H2421>revive<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1792>contrite.<s%>

For I will not <S%H7378>contend<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> neither will I be <S%H5331>always<s%> <S%H7107>angry;<s%> for the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> would <S%H5848>faint<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5397>me,<s%> and the souls who I have <S%H6213>made.<s%>

For the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of his <S%H1215>covetousness<s%> was I <S%H7107>angry,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5641>him;<s%> I hid myself and was <S%H7107>angry;<s%> and he went <S%H3212>on<s%> <S%H7726>backsliding<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and will <S%H7495>heal<s%> <S%H5148>him:<s%> I will lead him <S%H7999>also,<s%> and restore <S%H5150>comforts<s%> to him and to his <S%H57>mourners.<s%>

I <S%H1254>create<s%> the <S%H5108>fruit<s%> of the <S%H8193>lips:<s%> <S%H7965>Peace,<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> to him who is far <S%H7350>off<s%> and to him who is <S%H7138>near,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> "and I will heal <S%H7495>them.<s%>"

But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are like the <S%H1644>troubled<s%> <S%H3220>sea;<s%> for it <S%H3201>can't<s%> <S%H8252>rest,<s%> and its <S%H4325>waters<s%> cast <S%H1644>up<s%> <S%H7516>mire<s%> and <S%H2916>dirt.<s%>
"There is no <S%H7965>peace,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> "for the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>"
